log.error: Error importing XML: 'There is no XML format with name: 'XHTML-TRANSACTIONS' (ERR0206)' (ERR0257)

xmlText.p: BALTIMORE ORIOLES — Agreed to terms with DH Pedro Alvarez on a minor league contract.
BOSTON RED SOX — Agreed to terms with OF-DH J.D. Martinez on a five-year contract.
NEW YORK METS — Signed RHP A.J. Griffin to a minor league contract.
GARY SOUTHSHORE RAILCATS — Traded OF Joey Havrilak to Washington in exchange for a player to be named.
LINCOLN SALTDOGS — Signed RHP Austin Robichaux.
SIOUX FALLS CANARIES — Signed OF Christopher Grayson and OF Burt Reynolds.
ST. PAUL SAINTS — Signed OF Jordan Smith.
ROCKLAND BOULDERS — Traded INF Dylan Tice to Sugar Land for RHP Ryan Deemes.
ATLANTA HAWKS — Called up G Josh Magette and F Andrew White III from Erie (NBAGL).
AGUA CALIENTE CLIPPERS — Acquired F Skylar Spencer from the G League available player pool.
CHICAGO BEARS — Released LB Pernell McPhee and DB Quintin Demps.
CALGARY FLAMES — Claimed F Chris Stewart off waivers from Minnesota.

CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS — Assigned F Lance Bouma to Rockford (AHL). Acquired 2018 first- and fourth-round draft picks and F Victor Ejdsell frome Nashville for F Ryan Hartman and a 2018 fifth-round draft pick.
COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS — Acquired D Ian Cole from Ottawa for C Nick Moutrey and a 2020 third round draft pick.
MONTREAL CANADIENS — Acquired D Mike Reilly from Minnesota for a 2019 fifth-round draft pick.
NASHVILLE PREDATORS — Signed C Mike Fisher to a one-year contract.
PHILADELPHIA FLYERS — Claimed D Johnny Oduya off waivers from Ottawa.
SAN JOSE SHARKS — Acquired F Evander Kane from Buffalo Sabres for a 2019 conditional draft pick, F Danny O'Regan and a 2020 conditional draft pick.
WINNIPEG JETS — Acquired F Paul Stastny from St. Louis Blues for F Erik Foley, a 2018 first-round drat pick and conditional fourth-round 2020 draft pick.
WORCESTER RAILERS — Signed D Ryan MacKinnon.
VANCOUVER STEALTH — Signed T Andrew Suitor to a two-year contract extension through 2020.
CUMBERLAND — Announced the retirment men's basketball coach Lonnie Thompson.
EASTERN KENTUCKY — Fired men's basketball coach Dan McHale. Named Reece Gaines men's basketball coach.
